message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $175. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $120 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $155. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price!
Thanks for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $140 for the product. Let me know if this is something we can work with.

Thanks for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still a bit hesitant to go as low as $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product to you for $145. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product at this price!
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $140 for the product. This is my final offer as I am very mindful of my budget constraints.
